name: LEGO SMART Play
tagline: Bringing LEGO creations to life like never before
description: Powered by the new SMART Brick, this platform brings creations to life using sensors to react to movement and play. It is screen-free and compatible with existing sets.

name: Conversation API
tagline: Build chatbots with memory using just an API
description: Building AI chat features often means too much complexity ‚Äî SDKs, databases, and infrastructure ‚Äî just to support conversations and memory. Conversations API removes that overhead. Build stateful AI chat without managing backend systems. All chat data is stored for you ‚Äî you only keep the conversation_id. What it helps with ‚Äì AI chat memory & state ‚Äì Faster prompt iteration ‚Äì No backend setup ‚Äì Ideal for low-code builders Built after helping builders stuck on AI chat infra instead of product.

name: Dessix
tagline: Visual workspace to capture, organize, and create with AI
description: Dessix is a logic-first visual space for deep creators. Instead of wrestling with prompts, you build context visually, making AI an extension of your own thinking. Achieve true alignment‚Äîyou know what the AI knows, and it grasps your goals. Ditch the black box, accelerate your creation, and finally, take control.

name: Market Terminal
tagline: A Wall Street Terminal For Everyone
description: Wall Street pays up to $30K/year for their edge. That's how they stay ahead ‚Äî better data, faster intel, institutional-grade tools. We're here to change that. We built a Wall Street terminal for independent traders and investors. Real-time breakouts, smart money tracking, insider & Congress trades, AI-powered analysis ‚Äî all in one place, at a fraction of the cost.

name: Graysky 2.0
tagline: A faster alternative client for Bluesky
description: Graysky 2.0 adds Liquid Glass support!

name: Planelo
tagline: The idea-first hub for developers
description: Planelo is an idea-first workspace for developers. Capture, structure and connect ideas across iPhone, iPad and macOS ‚Äî without the clutter of traditional project tools. Each idea and project exposes an API endpoint, enabling automations and custom workflows. This launch brings a clean interface, keyboard-friendly navigation, encrypted sync, and API keys to turn ideas into actions.

name: AgentNotch
tagline: Real-time AI coding assistant telemetry in your Mac's notch
description: AgentNotch is a macOS menu bar app that lives in your Mac's notch, providing real-time visibility into your AI coding assistants. Watch as Claude Code and OpenAI Codex think, read files, and execute tools while you do other tasks. Install via Brew, and follow guide on Github to setup telemetry for CC and Codex. brew tap AppGram/tap brew install --cask agentnotch

name: Gridfy.io
tagline: Live interactive widgets from Airtable, Notion or Sheets
description: Gridfy.io turns your Airtable, Notion, or Google Sheets data into live, customizable website widgets ‚Äî no code required. Embed interactive, filterable grids that update in real time and match your brand‚Äôs look and feel. üöÄ No-code live data widgets from Airtable, Notion & Sheets üé® Fully customizable design: colors, fonts, layout üîç Search, filters & sorting built in üìà Stats & usage tracking for your widgets üîê Domain access control to restrict where widgets run

name: Too Many Buttons
tagline: Only one button works. Every other click is chaos.
description: Too Many Buttons is a chaotic browser game where only ONE button works. Every other click unleashes random chaos - screen shakes, fake alerts, loud sounds, and instant frustration. Play Classic mode at your own pace or Speedrun mode against the clock. Choose multiple difficulties with up to 200 buttons on screen. Built with a retro pixel look and zero instructions, it‚Äôs simple, infuriating, and oddly addictive. No sign-up. No downloads. Just click and survive the chaos.

name: NotifyGate
tagline: One Gate for all your Notifications
description: Control your notifications without code changes. Route to Slack, Discord, Email & more. Mute noisy alerts, throttle chatty services, and escalate critical issues‚Äîall from a web UI. Built-in retries, real-time dashboards & AI agent integration.

name: Claw Executive OS
tagline: Digital chief of staff that automates your files with AI
description: The Executive OS that automates your local file system via AI agents. No code. No monthly fees. Just results. Claw is a secure, local-first janitor that organizes your digital chaos instantly. It processes files on-device (privacy-first) and bridges to the AgenticFlow Cloud for complex 24/7 delegation. Pay once, keep it forever.

name: Datastripes Lens
tagline: Turn any web data into instant, interactive charts
description: Stop copying data to spreadsheets. Datastripes Lens is a free Chrome extension that transforms boring tables and numbers on any webpage into a powerful gallery of interactive charts with one click. Your personal data analyst, right in your browser.

name: TheTabber
tagline: Create, repurpose, and post across 9+ social platforms
description: TheTabber.com helps creators upload or pull content from another account, then repurpose and publish it everywhere. It has smart scheduling, analytics, and AI-powered tools.

name: Droppy
tagline: Notch Shelf, Floating Basket & Clipboard Manager for macOS
description: Droppy combines 5 essential productivity tools into one macOS app: üóÇÔ∏è Notch Shelf - Files snap into your MacBook's notch üß∫ Floating Basket - Summon with a mouse jiggle üìã Clipboard Manager - History with OCR üéµ Media Player - Now Playing in your notch üîä Custom HUDs - Volume/brightness overlays Free & Open Source forever.

name: yolog.dev Desktop
tagline: Never lose a vibe coding session. Archive, replay, search.
description: Your vibe coding sessions disappear into JSONL files you'll never open again. yolog.dev Desktop fixes this. üóÇÔ∏è Archive & Replay ‚Äì Import from Claude Code. Full playback with timeline. üîç Search ‚Äì Find that decision you made with AI couple days ago. üìä Vibe Metrics ‚Äì Token leverage, burn rate, flow detection, streak tracking. üí∞ Cost Tracking ‚Äì Per-project / Per-session breakdowns. üîí Privacy-First ‚Äì All data stays local. ~10MB app.

name: Zyve
tagline: A context-aware, intelligent day planner
description: Zyve is a context-aware day planner built for real life. It upgrades events with live intelligence like traffic, weather, nearby places, and timing gaps so plans stay realistic, not theoretical. Designed for people coordinating with others, Zyve helps you adjust on the fly, avoid clashes, and move through the day calmly instead of constantly reacting.

name: Webira - AI Website Creator
tagline: Create sleek, high-speed responsive websites in minutes
description: üöÄ Still struggling to build a quality website? It's time to get rid of the frustration and get results in minutes. Webira is your AI-powered website creator that designs & creates complete, professional sites for you in minutes. No more frustration. Webira does everything for you ‚ö° Create a perfect website plan and copy ‚ö°Make amazing design, graphics & responsive webpages. Works for any business, any niche. Go from idea to done!

name: SummonAI Kit
tagline: One command to rule your codebase
description: SummonAI Kit is a CLI tool that transforms any codebase into a fully-configured Claude Code environment. Instead of manually writing CLAUDE.md files, configuring skills, and setting up agents ‚Äî run one command. SummonAI Kit analyzes your repo, detects your frameworks, and generates everything Claude needs to understand your stack from day one. Works with any language, any framework. Built for developers who want first-try accuracy without the setup overhead.

name: Simple Attende
tagline: Track attendance for your groups and members with ease.
description: Simple Attende lets you track attendance for teams, classes, and groups with clear reports and flexible exports. Create groups, add members, record attendance, and review detailed analytics to understand participation and performance. You can export data to Excel and calculate salaries based on working hours and pay rates. Start free with one group and up to 10 members, then upgrade to manage more groups and members across small businesses, schools, gyms, healthcare, and events.

name: Mailsfinder - Find & Verify Emails
tagline: Stop overpaying for email finding & verification
description: We built MailsFinder after struggling with overpriced, inaccurate tools ourselves. Find emails, verify them instantly, and protect your sender reputation ‚Äî without juggling multiple tools or burning cash.
